summary:
- **Buy-back Type**: On-market buy-back  
- **Total Buy-back Program**: Up to AUD 400 million worth of ordinary shares  
- **Buy-back Period**: 28/3/2025 to 27/3/2026 (subject to market conditions)  
- **Daily Buy-back (7/7/2025)**:  
  - Shares bought: 90,339  
  - Total consideration: AUD 1,779,750.57  
  - Price range: AUD 19.60 (low) to AUD 19.80 (high)  
- **Remaining Capacity**: No explicit limit on shares, but total program capped at AUD 400M  
- **Broker**: Goldman Sachs Australia Pty Ltd  

No material changes to capital structure or liquidity beyond ongoing buy-back execution.
